title: looking for serious duo or more partners to play almost on a daily basis (silver+)
body:
Hey guys, girls and other.... 

im dan or dust what ever you prefer, 
im S5 just made the climb out of bronze, 
looking for serious people to play with, 
if you want to make it to gold! then add me and we will work something out.

Roles: top, sup, mid, adc and jg (in that order) got 4+ champs in each role exctp jg only got 2
Rank: Silver 5 looking to make gold - plat
Age: 19 turning 20 (age does not matter just dont really want my ear drums pieced)
i got skype, TS and i can get anything needed.

replies.body: also just escaped the B league,. I play often, normally play adc or mid, can do top. refuse to jungle. Have mic and prefer to use TS

Well, I have a silver 3 (I don't play on this anymore) and a gold 3 account. I honestly think I can easily get to plat if I had time so I don't mind playing/carrying you as long as we have a good synergy. I believe I am a pretty funny person that trash talks all the time but does not type that on chat. 
Main role: Jg, Top
JG: {{champion:11}} {{champion:19}} {{champion:24}} 
TOP: {{champion:58}} {{champion:92}} 
Age: 17
Note: I am having a school holiday on 24th March when I'll be able to play 24/7. Before then, especially since this last two weeks are exam weeks, I cannot play much.
Links: http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=main+master+yi
